FuncDef: This command enables the configuration of a cipher. Client-ciphers are used when the SR OS is acting as an SSH client. Server-ciphers are used when the SR OS is acting as an SSH server.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the index of the cipher in the list. Values-1 to 255.

Specifies the algorithm used when performing encryption or decryption. Values-For SSHv1:
	Client ciphers: des, 3des, blowfish
Server ciphers: 3des, blowfish
Table 21 lists the default ciphers used for SSHv1:.
